#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define getcx getchar
#define maxn 1005
#define F(i,p,n) for(i=p;i<n;i++)
#define I(i,p,q) for(i=p;i>=q;i--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define Ps(x) printf("%d ",x)
#define LL long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
int a[maxn],cal[maxn];
int bs(int i,int j,int val)
{
    int p=i,q=j,m;
    while(p!=q)
    {
        m=(p+q)>>1;
        if(a[m]<=val)
            p=m+1;
        else
            q=m;
    }
    if(a[p]>val)
        return p-1;
    return p;

}
int main()
{
    int i,j,k,m,n,t;
    S(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int ans=0;
        S(n);
        S(m);

        F(i,0,n)
            S(a[i]);
        sort(a,a+n);
        cal[0]=1;
        F(i,1,n)
        {
            cal[i]=cal[i-1];
            if(a[i]!=a[i-1])
                cal[i]++;
        }
        /*printf("sorted array:\n");
        F(i,0,n)
        printf("%d  ",a[i]);
        printf("\n");
        printf("cal array:\n");
        F(j,0,n)
            printf("%d  ",cal[j]);
        printf("\n");*/
        int prev1=0;
        F(i,0,n-2)
        {
            if(a[i]!=prev1)
            {
                int prev2=0;
                F(j,i+1,n-1)
                {
                    if(prev2!=a[j])
                    {
                        int ret=bs(j+1,n-1,m-(a[i]+a[j]));
                        ans+=cal[ret]-cal[j];
                        if(ret!=j&&a[j]==a[j+1])
                            ans++;
                        //printf("i=%d val1=%d j=%d val2=%d ret=%d ans=%d\n",i,a[i],j,a[j],ret,ans);
                        prev2=a[j];
                    }

                }
                prev1=a[i];
            }

        }
        P(ans);
        F(i,0,n)
        cal[i]=0;
    }
    return 0;
}
